-  -  - EXAMINATION
Good morning, Ms. Nelson.
speaker: MS. KRENICKY

text: Good morning.
speaker: THE WITNESS

text: We met briefly off the record, but for the record, my name is Karleen Krenicky.  I represent the Defendant, Mr. Guerrero Lopez, that was just here in the lawsuit that you have filed against him for a car accident that happened back on October 31st of 2017. You just sat through his deposition, yours will be similar in that it's just a question-and-answer session, but I'm trying to find out about you, about your background, the accident that brings us here today, and then the injuries that you are claiming from the accident.  Okay?
speaker: MS. KRENICKY

text: Yes.
speaker: THE WITNESS

text: A transcript is getting made of everything everyone says, so it's very important that only one of us speaks at a time and that all of your answers are out loud.  Everyone does it.  Try really hard not to say mhmm, for example.  If you mean yes or you mean no, just make sure you say it out loud.  Okay?
speaker: MS. KRENICKY

text: Yes.
speaker: THE WITNESS

text: Do not guess.  If you do not know something or you do not remember something, that's perfectly fine.  Dan doesn't want you to guess, I don't want you to guess.  Just say, "I don't know," "I don't recall," whatever is the appropriate response.  Okay?
speaker: MS. KRENICKY

text: Yes.

speaker: MS. KRENICKY

text: Yes.
speaker: THE WITNESS

text: If you do not understand one of my questions, let me know that you don't understand it.  If you answer one of my questions today, I will assume you heard it, you understood it, and that is what you are answering; is that fair?

text: How did the accident happen?
speaker: MS. KRENICKY

text: So I was leaving from my dad's house, I pulled -- I was coming to the top of 12th Street, I saw the stop sign.  As I'm approaching the stop sign, I noticed that it was shrubbery on my left-hand side and kids were trick or treating, so I slowly approached the second time.  And as I approached the second time to the stop sign, I noticed a car was five or six car lengths away from me.  And once I noticed that it was a clear way to drive, I proceeded to making my left turn. As I began to turn, I noticed the car coming closer, and probably like four or five seconds of noticing him, I noticed that he wasn't slowing down as I was turning.  So I began blowing the horn and I slammed on brakes and I noticed that he was looking down at his phone.  And by the time he looked up, he hit my car.
